attributes.action: Hold an election for the next Monarch from the current royal family on the death of the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the next monarch be selected by election following the death of the incumbent.  All direct descendants over 18 (children and grandchildren) of the deceased would be eligible to stand. Thus we would only get a monarch who wants the role and has proved fit for purpose.
